examples.korean: ‘We’re meeting Jake for lunch and we can go on the yacht in the afternoon.’ ‘Cool!’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook “우리 점심 때 제이크 만날 건데 오후엔 요트 타러 갈 수도 있어.” “좋았어!” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: I’m having fish. What about you? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 난 생선을 먹을 건데. 넌? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: I was trying to apologize but it came out wrong. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 사과를 하려고 했던 건데 일이 잘못되고 말았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
